content: the candy stripes baby blanket is the ultimate classic crochet baby blanket pattern it is super fun and perfect for beginner crocheters if you re making your blanket for a baby boy or going for a more gender-neutral look try swapping out the pinks for shades of blue yellow green or purple **materials ** to make this blanket you will need the following supplies -knit picks brava worsted weight yarn -7 skeins 1420 yards white colour a -2 skeins 230 yards blush colour b -1 skein 115 yards cotton candy colour c -size h-8 5 mm crochet hook -scissors -tapestry/yarn needle for weaving in ends **measurements ** finished blanket measures 35 5 wide x 44 5 long ﻿**skill level ** ﻿beginner
